original_text:
The Lord Almighty is the one you are to regard as holy,
    he is the one you are to fear,
    he is the one you are to dread.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와 그를 너희가 거룩하다 하고 그를 너희가 두려워하며 무서워 할 자로 삼으라

sentences.original_text: The Lord Almighty is the one you are to regard as holy
sentences.korean_translation: 만군의 여호와는 너희가 거룩히 여겨야 할 이시니

sentences.original_text: he is the one you are to fear
he is the one you are to dread
